properties.Name: MarketType
properties.Description:
A categorization of Markets based upon common characteristics, attributes or Market Segments serviced.

There are two basic types of markets:   Consumer and Organizational

The Consumer market consists of individuals who buy products for their own use or benefit.

The Organizational market consists of businesses, institutions, industries and government bodies that purchase products for resale or to make other products.

The "Organizational" Market Type consists of three large Markets and the representative Market Segments (indented):

1. Industrial Producers
- Corporations
- Independent R&D Laboratories

2. Trade Industry 
- Retailers
- Wholesalers

3. Government
- Local
- State
- Federal
- Foreign

Columns.Name: MarketTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Market Type.

Columns.Name: MarketTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Market Type.

Columns.Name: MarketTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Market Type.

Properties.Description:
A categorization of Markets based upon common characteristics, attributes or Market Segments serviced.

There are two basic types of markets:   Consumer and Organizational

The Consumer market consists of individuals who buy products for their own use or benefit.

The Organizational market consists of businesses, institutions, industries and government bodies that purchase products for resale or to make other products.

The "Organizational" Market Type consists of three large Markets and the representative Market Segments (indented):

1. Industrial Producers
- Corporations
- Independent R&D Laboratories

2. Trade Industry 
- Retailers
- Wholesalers

3. Government
- Local
- State
- Federal
- Foreign
